description: This is a comprehensive FastAPI server implementing OAuth 2.0 flows with Atlassian's Jira and Confluence, along with user management, integration endpoints, and proxy route aliases. It sets up middleware for logging, request ID propagation, and error handling, and includes various endpoints for OAuth redirects, callbacks, user CRUD, and integration actions.

classes.name: SafeJSONFormatter
classes.description: A custom JSON formatter class for structured logging with secret redaction support.

classes.name: RequestIDMiddleware
classes.description: ASGI middleware to handle request ID propagation and logging of unhandled exceptions.

methods.name: logging.Logger _configure_logging()
methods.description: Initializes the logger with JSON formatting and environment-based log level.

methods.name: str _redact_value(_: Any)
methods.description: Obfuscates sensitive values for logging.

methods.name: bool _should_redact(key: str)
methods.description: Decision function to determine if a header key or parameter should be redacted.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _redact_mapping(mapping: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Creates a redacted copy of a dictionary of key-value pairs.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] _get_headers_subset(request: Request)
methods.description: Extracts a safe subset of headers for logging, avoiding sensitive info.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _sanitized_query_params(request: Request)
methods.description: Returns redacted query parameters for logging.

methods.name: None _log_event( level: int, event: str, request: Request, provider: Optional[str] = None, status_code: Optional[int] = None, **fields: Any, )
methods.description: Logs structured events with context including request metadata.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Health check endpoint indicating the API is running.

methods.name: oauth_health_check()
methods.description: Checks health/status of OAuth configuration setup.

methods.name: oauth_health_check_alias()
methods.description: Alias route for OAuth health check.

methods.name: jira_login( request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None, response: Optional[str] = None, )
methods.description: Starts Jira OAuth login by redirecting to Atlassian OAuth URL.

methods.name: jira_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles OAuth callback: token exchange, user token storage, and redirecting to frontend.

methods.name: create_user_endpoint(payload: UserCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Create or get an existing user idempotently.

methods.name: list_users_endpoint(db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: List all stored users.

methods.name: get_user_endpoint(user_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieve a user by internal ID.

methods.name: confluence_login(request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Initiates Confluence OAuth login.

methods.name: confluence_callback(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles Confluence OAuth callback, exchanging code for tokens, storing, and redirecting.

methods.name: connect_jira(db=Depends(get_db), payload: UserCreate | None = None)
methods.description: Guides client to start OAuth connection with Jira.

methods.name: connect_confluence(db=Depends(get_db), payload: UserCreate | None = None)
methods.description: Guides client to start OAuth connection with Confluence.

methods.name: fetch_jira_projects(db=Depends(get_db), owner_id: int | None = None)
methods.description: Placeholder to fetch JIRA projects for a user, returning stored projects.

methods.name: fetch_confluence_pages(db=Depends(get_db), owner_id: int | None = None)
methods.description: Placeholder to fetch Confluence pages for a user, returning stored pages.

methods.name: upsert_jira_project_endpoint(payload: JiraProjectCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates or updates a JIRA project record.

methods.name: list_jira_projects_endpoint(owner_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Lists JIRA projects for a specific user.

methods.name: upsert_confluence_page_endpoint(payload: ConfluencePageCreate, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates or updates a Confluence page record.

methods.name: list_confluence_pages_endpoint(owner_id: int, db=Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Lists Confluence pages for a user.

methods.name: jira_login_api_alias(request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None, response: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Proxy route alias for Jira login.

methods.name: jira_callback_api_alias(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Proxy route alias for Jira callback.

methods.name: confluence_login_api_alias(request: Request, state: Optional[str] = None, scope: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Proxy route alias for Confluence login.

methods.name: confluence_callback_api_alias(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Proxy route alias for Confluence callback.

methods.name: atlassian_callback_alias(request: Request, db=Depends(get_db), code: Optional[str] = None, state: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Generic alias for Atlassian OAuth callback, delegating to Jira handler.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] _ocean_response(data: Any, message: str = "ok")
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: dispatch(self, request: Request, call_next)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: str format(self, record: logging.LogRecord)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: global_exception_handler(request: Request, exc: Exception)
methods.description: unavailable
